caption.title: Total saponin content (%).
caption.p: In the figure different lower case letters (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z, w, v) in the bars indicates significant differences among means (PË‚0.05). The gray colour bars indicate the 20% ethanolic extracts. X-axis denotes the plant name and Y-axis denotes the concentrations of total saponin contents (%).
